body: I'd love to explore how we might reclaim 4–6 hours of your creative time each week. We'll find the approach that serves your energy and vision. This transition moment — honoring what Kali Das built while stepping into your next evolution — is an ideal time to establish rhythms that reflect your unique gift.
ctaIntroText: To get started, reach out by email or book a discovery call — whichever feels right for you.
quote: And I'm going to be as bold as to say that transparent communities are essential to the evolution of humanity as a new non-violent social structure.
